page.title: 15HOUSING IN SEAFORD
page.content: MOST{FAMILIES}IN THE AREA LIVE IN {HOUSES,}ALTHOUGH THERE ARE SOME{FLATS AND A GREAT MANY{BUNGALOWS,}OCCUPIED MAINLY BY RETIRED PEOPLE.{THERE IS A {LOT OF BUILDING AT PRESENT}AND THERE ARE{MANY NEW PROPERTIES FOR SALE,}SOME OF THEM VERY EXPENSIVE. THERE WERE TWO FAIRLY LARGE{COUNCIL {ESTATES}IN THE TOWN AND A THIRD HAS RECENTLY BEEN COMPLETED. FAMILIES RENT THESE HOUSES FROM THE LEWES DISTRICT COUNCIL WHICH ALLOCATES HOUSES TO MEET THE NEEDS OF THE TENNANTS. SOME PEOPLE HAVE BOUGHT THEIR COUNCIL HOUSES. THE{OLDEST HOMES}IN THE AREA ARE NEARLY{TWO HUNDRED YEARS OLD.}SOME ARE BUILT OF FLINT. MY HOUSE IS{SEMI-DETACHED WITH {THREE BEDROOMS,}BATHROOM, DINING ROOM, KITCHEN, LOUNGE, CONSERVATORY AND HALL. MY ROOM IS SMALL AND COSY.I HAVE A LOVELY VIEW AND A GARDEN WITH TREES.
